Name: Standard grant
Description: Grants are transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.

Name: Interest subsidy
Description: A payment to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

Name: Interest subsidy to national private exporters (withdrawn)
Capital subscription on deposit basis
Description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally encashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

Name: Capital subscription on encashment basis
Description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally encashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

Name: Loan in a joint venture with the recipient (withdrawn)
Standard loan
Description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt...

Name: Reimbursable grant
Description: A contribution provided to a recipient institution for investment purposes...

Name: Asset-backed securities
Description: Securities whose value and income payments are derived from and backed by a specific pool of underlying assets.

Name: Subordinated loan
Description: A loan that, in the event of default, will only be repaid after all senior obligations have been satisfied...

Name: Preferred equity
Description: Equity that, in the event of default, will be repaid after all senior obligations...

Name: Non-banks non-guaranteed portions of guaranteed export credits (withdrawn)
Common equity
Description: A share in the ownership of a corporation that gives the owner claims on the residual value of the corporation after creditors’ claims have been met.

Name: Acquisition of equity not part of joint venture in developing countries (withdrawn)
Shares in collective investment vehicles
Description: Collective undertakings through which investors pool funds for investment...

Name: Reinvested earnings
Description: This item is only applicable to Foreign Direct Investment (FDI)...

Name: Debt rescheduling: OOF claim (DSR – original loan principal)
Debt rescheduling: OOF claim (DSR – original loan interest)
Debt rescheduling: Private claim (DSR – original loan principal)
Debt rescheduling: export credit claim (DSR – original loan principal)
Foreign direct investment, new capital outflow (withdrawn)
Purchase of securities from issuing agencies (withdrawn)
Securities and other instruments originally issued by multilateral agencies (withdrawn)
